message: @channel Reminder: Code review for PR #234 is needed before we can merge. Please review by EOD today. It's blocking the release pipeline.
Hey team, we need to finalize the feature specifications for the new dashboard by Friday. @Mike can you share the wireframes? @Sarah please review the user stories.
Team - The blog post about our new product launch needs to be published by Nov 18th. Who can take ownership of this? We also need social media graphics ready.
@Lisa @John We need your feedback on the new brand guidelines by tomorrow. The client is waiting for our response. Please prioritize this!
Urgent: Demo environment is down. We have a client presentation in 2 hours. @DevOps can someone help ASAP?
We've received multiple tickets about the login issue. @Engineering can we get an update on the fix? Customers are getting frustrated.
Reminder: All managers need to submit Q4 performance reviews by Nov 20th. Please don't wait until the last minute. Reach out if you need help with the system.
@team We need to update the SSL certificates on production servers by Nov 22nd before they expire. I'll create tickets for each service. Please acknowledge when you see this.
Budget reports are overdue from 3 departments. Please submit by Friday or we'll miss the board meeting deadline. This is critical.
The new API documentation needs to be completed before the v3.0 release. @Sarah can you help with the authentication section? Target date is Nov 25th.
User testing session scheduled for Nov 21st. We need 5 participants from the beta group. Can someone coordinate this?
@channel Don't forget - email campaign for Black Friday goes out Nov 23rd. All assets need approval by Nov 20th. Let's get this done!
